subject: p18978682
History: -year-old woman with increased oxygen requirement, shortness of breath.
Findings: Comparison is made to the prior radiographs from. The right-sided PICC line has been re-adjusted and the distal tip is now within the distal SVC. The heart size is within normal limits. There is a small left-sided pleural effusion and left retrocardiac opacity. There is some atelectasis at the lung bases. No pneumothoraces are seen.
